title: If LoL Had an Ability Draft Mode What Ability Combination Would you Pick?
body:
Rules:
1. When you pick a champ passive you also get their base stats and character model
2. You can mix and match abilities but the abilities you pick must go in their relevant slots (e.g. no picking four Ultis or four Q's).
3. You also get whatever costs are involved for each ability (so you'll have a mana bar and an energy bar if you take spells from both Lee Sin and Syndra).

I'm thinking:

Annie's passive
Morgana's Q
Cassiopeia's W
Ezreal's E
Katarina's R
